title: Technical Consultation
subtitle: STEP 01
desc: We understand your requirements, budget range, site conditions, and project goals. Our engineers visit the site (if required), evaluate feasibility, and suggest the best technical solutions. Initial guidance on construction method, materials, timelines, and cost estimation is provided.

title: Booking & Agreement
subtitle: STEP 02
desc: Once the scope is finalized, the client confirms the project by booking our services. A detailed agreement is prepared covering project scope, timelines, payment milestones, quality standards, and legal terms. Transparency is ensured so both parties are aligned before work begins.

title: Design & Planning
subtitle: STEP 03
desc: If the client already has drawings or plans, they can share them with us for technical review and execution planning. If not, our in-house team prepares complete designs and drawings based on the clientâ€™s requirements, budget, and site conditions. Final designs, materials, timelines, and execution details are approved in this stage to ensure smooth construction.

title: Construction & Execution
subtitle: STEP 04
desc: Our skilled engineers, supervisors, and workforce execute the construction as per approved drawings and quality standards. Regular site updates, inspections, and progress reports are shared with the client. Safety, quality, and timelines are strictly monitored.

title: Handover & Move-in
subtitle: STEP 05
desc: After completion, final inspections and quality checks are conducted. The project is handed over with all required documents, warranties, and completion reports. Any final touch-ups are completed, ensuring the client can move in with complete peace of mind.
